name: There is are Hundred of Them
name_original: There is are Hundred of Them
description:
There is are Hundred of Them

is the game that was grown up from the test work for the interview.

This is about the group of thiefs that try to steal king's treasure. But they get caught. Now you have to fight hundreds of dangerous monsters. 

Can you earn the king's pardon?

Source code: https://github.com/Sunderer325/ThereIsAHundredOfThem

Sprites: 1-Bit Platformer Pack by Kenney

Music & SFX: GIGA-PACK Sounds; Mayan Themed - Music Asset Pack

Game by White Forest
